title: When are the skins going to be available
body:
Hey guys whats up whats going on Captain Monk is here ¬_¬
< Just kidding > 

So i got a good question and that is when are the new skins going to be out ( Dawnbringer Riven , Nightbringer Yasuo )
I am shaking because the skins are not Available ;-;

replies.body:
Skins are 95% of the time released on either Tuesday or Thursday. 

There is a good chance it can be released on Thursday, but seeing how there supposed to be an event around it, I am suspecting it will be released next Tuesday.
but the event is on monday not on tuesday

Really....because it looks like the event and the skins are out right now...on a Thursday. 


{{sticker:slayer-pantheon-popcorn}}

Hey Captain Monk.... :D

http://i.imgur.com/tNmAeaO.jpg

That is a good question, but I don't know!  :(  Patch notes give an idea of when new content is aimed for release, but it doesn't mean the same day.  You'll just have to bookmark the [News](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/) page for updates, and try not to shake too much.  Hang tight!

i can't stop the shaking mate
Tell the rioter ( the Head of the company ) to release the skin Fast cause i can't wait this time
cause i already payed and i can't hold that rp till the skin gets available , is that your plan to make us pay earlier and then we can't hold back our rp so we buy a skin then when the skin comes out we pay rp again to buy it 
so you get more money -_-
so it's really 4 days from now and the skins will get released ?

For some reason Riot requires us to wait 5+ days after the patch to release the new skins .... its very annoying and I understand your pain. Sadly their ways prolly cost them some sales as I can personally say the new cait skin and the khazix skin would have been purchased by me day 1 if they brought it out on time. 
Sadly they didnt so I just poured my funds into players unknown battlegrounds. Dont worry one day Riot will get it together and release content in a more timely manner ... until then its hurting no one but themselves. All you need to do is just be patient or spend your money elsewhere since they cannot release their content in a timely manner. Speak with your wallet is what I always say.
I saw them not in the shop but under skins tab when u click on the champions but i dont know how to get them...

When a new skin comes out, they usually wait a couple days to actually release the skin. I saw a page talking about the Riven vs Yasuo event saying the event will happen on June 19th. Hopefully it's sooner then that but if not, you'll have to wait 5 days.
